org.javafxdata.control.cell

Class ExpandOnMouseEventTableRow<S>

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.control.Control
          • javafx.scene.control.Labeled
            • javafx.scene.control.Cell<T>
              • javafx.scene.control.IndexedCell<T>
                • javafx.scene.control.TableRow<S>
                  • org.javafxdata.control.cell.ExpandOnMouseEventTableRow<S>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - The type of the elements contained within the TableView.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable

    public class ExpandOnMouseEventTableRow<S>
extends javafx.scene.control.TableRow<S>

    A class containing a TableRow implementation that expands when a certain mouse event occurs. When the row expands, it allows for additional information to be shown to the user in all columns.

    Author:
    Jonathan Giles
